text: The 1985–86 Combined Counties Football League season was the eighth in the history of the Combined Counties Football League, a football competition in England. The league was won by British Aerospace (Weybridge) for the second time. Newcomers Chertsey Town finished as runners-up and were promoted back to the Isthmian League. ==Clubs== The league remained at 19 clubs after Southwick were promoted to the Isthmian League and one new club joined: *Chertsey Town, relegated from the Isthmian League. ===League table=== ==References== ==External links== * Combined Counties League Official Site 1985-86 Category:1985–86 in English football leagues
title: 1985–86 Combined Counties Football League
